articles.content:
Brazzaville Juche idea study group formed in Congo
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Brazzaville, Congo, Juche idea study group was inaugurated with due ceremony in Brazzaville on April 19.
 At the ceremony an official of the Congolese association for friendship among peoples was elected chairman of the group.
